content.html:
Over the years, I have built a bunch of tools which help me on an every day basis. Here are some which you can have a go at!

ToolPurposePricing
LinkBorgLink shortener and single page profile with free, open APIFree!
QrBorgGenerate QR codes easily from a single API call or from within the browserFree!
Random Project Name Generator APIGenerate a random project name similar to the ones on Github/Repl.it via a single API call!Free!
Vectorize.shDocuments to Vector store within seconds, with a ready to hit swagger API documentation!Free (upto a document size limit!)
LlamaStudioConvert prompts to APIs within seconds!Free within limits
